## Cheatsheets {#cheatsheets}

There are several [cheatsheets](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/){target=_blank}
provided by RStudio. 

### Beginner

- [RStudio](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/rstudio-ide.pdf)
- [Importing data](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/data-import.pdf)
- [Data transformation](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/data-transformation.pdf)
- [Data visualization](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/data-visualization-2.1.pdf)

### Advanced beginner/Intermediate

- [Working with strings](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/strings.pdf)
- [Reporting with R Markdown](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/rmarkdown-2.0.pdf)

### Advanced

- Maps
  - [Cartography](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/cartography.pdf)
  - [Simple features in maps](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/sf.pdf)
- Text data and strings
  - [Regular expressions](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/regex.pdf)
- [Machine learning](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/caret.pdf)
- [Package development](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/package-development.pdf)

## Books {#books}

Most of the books listed have a free online version. 

- R for dummies (see emailed PDF)
- [Hands-on Programming with R](https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/)
- [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/){target=_blank}
- [Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction](https://socviz.co/)
- [R Markdown: The Definitive Guide](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/)
